member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions
member.summary: Various extension methods to convert between SkiaSharp types and CoreGraphics types.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGColor(SkiaSharp.SKColor)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into a CoreGraphics color.
member.returns: Returns a CoreGraphics color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCGImage(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a CoreGraphics image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a CoreGraphics image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCIColor(SkiaSharp.SKColor)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into a CoreImage color.
member.returns: Returns a CoreImage color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCIImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a CoreImage image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a CoreImage image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCIImage(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a CoreImage image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a CoreImage image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a CoreImage image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a CoreImage image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToCIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a CoreImage image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a CoreImage image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToNSData(SkiaSharp.SKData)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp data object into a NSData.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the data as a NSData.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToPoint(SkiaSharp.SKPoint)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp point into a CoreGraphics point.
member.returns: Returns a CoreGraphics point.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToRect(SkiaSharp.SKRect)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp rectangle into a CoreGraphics rectangle.
member.returns: Returns a CoreGraphics rectangle.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToSize(SkiaSharp.SKSize)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp size into a CoreGraphics size.
member.returns: Returns a CoreGraphics size.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKBitmap(CoreGraphics.CGImage)
member.summary: Converts a CoreGraphics image into a SkiaSharp bitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp bitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKBitmap(CoreImage.CIImage)
member.summary: Converts a CoreImage image into a SkiaSharp bitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp bitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKColor(CoreGraphics.CGColor)
member.summary: Converts a CoreGraphics color into a SkiaSharp color.
member.returns: Returns a SkiaSharp color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKColor(CoreImage.CIColor)
member.summary: Converts a CoreImage color into a SkiaSharp color.
member.returns: Returns a SkiaSharp color.

member.summary: Converts a NSData into a SkiaSharp data object.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.AppleExtensions.ToSKImage(CoreImage.CIImage)
member.summary: Converts a CoreImage image into a SkiaSharp image.

member.param: The SkiaSharp pixmap to hold the copy of the image data.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToSKBitmap(UIKit.UIImage)
member.summary: Converts a UIKit image into a SkiaSharp bitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp bitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToSKColor(UIKit.UIColor)
member.summary: Converts a UIKit color into a SkiaSharp color.
member.returns: Returns a SkiaSharp color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToSKImage(UIKit.UIImage)
member.summary: Converts a UIKit image into a SkiaSharp image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToSKPixmap(UIKit.UIImage,SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.param: The SkiaSharp pixmap to hold the copy of the image data.
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns if the copy was successful, otherwise .

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIColor(SkiaSharp.SKColor)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into a UIKit color.
member.returns: Returns a UIKit color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap,System.nfloat,UIKit.UIImageOrientation)
member.param: The scale factor for the image. A factor of 1.0 is the original size of the image.
The rotation that is to be applied to the image.
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap,System.nfloat,UIKit.UIImageOrientation)
member.param: The scale factor for the image. A factor of 1.0 is the original size of the image.
The rotation that is to be applied to the image.
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a UIKit image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.iOSExtensions.ToUIImage(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI,System.nfloat,UIKit.UIImageOrientation)
member.param: The scale factor for the image. A factor of 1.0 is the original size of the image.
The rotation that is to be applied to the image.
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a UIKit image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a UIKit image.

member.summary: Delegate interface for .

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer
member.summary: A CoreAnimation layer that can be drawn on using SkiaSharp drawing commands.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer
member.summary: Default constructor that initializes a new instance of .

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer.CanvasSize
member.summary: Gets the current canvas size.
member.remarks: The canvas size may be different to the view size as a result of the current device's pixel density.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer.DrawInContext(CoreGraphics.CGContext)
member.param: The prepared context to draw into.
member.summary: Draws the layer on the specified context.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer.DrawInSurface(SkiaSharp.SKSurface,SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo)
member.summary: Implement this to draw on the canvas.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer.IgnorePixelScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drawing canvas should be resized on high resolution displays.
member.remarks: By default, when false, the canvas is resized to 1 canvas pixel per display pixel. When true, the canvas is resized to device independent pixels, and then stretched to fill the view. Although performance is improved and all objects are the same size on different display densities, blurring and pixelation may occur.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer.OnPaintSurface(SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKPaintSurfaceEventArgs)
member.param: The event arguments that contain the drawing surface and information.
member.summary: Implement this to draw on the canvas.

member.name: E:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer.PaintSurface
member.summary: Occurs when the the canvas needs to be redrawn.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.tvOS.SKCanvasLayer.SKDelegate
member.summary: Gets or sets the layer's delegate object.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drawing canvas should be resized on high resolution displays.
member.remarks: By default, when false, the canvas is resized to 1 canvas pixel per display pixel. When true, the canvas is resized to device independent pixels, and then stretched to fill the view. Although performance is improved and all objects are the same size on different display densities, blurring and pixelation may occur.
